mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_txn_daily (chain_id,group_id,stat_date,txn,block_number,create_time,modify_time) VALUES(#{chainId},#{groupId},#{statDate},#{txn},#{blockNumber},now(),now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE txn=#{txn}, block_number=#{blockNumber}, modify_time=NOW()
mapper.select:
SELECT max(block_number) blockNumber, count(block_number) txn, DATE_FORMAT(block_timestamp,'%Y-%m-%d') statDate FROM tb_transaction_#{chainId}_#{groupId} WHERE block_timestamp >= (SELECT IFNULL(max(stat_date),0) FROM tb_txn_daily WHERE chain_id = #{chainId} AND group_id = #{groupId})
GROUP BY statDate
